title: Ticket #456: Release tarballs on rhel3 are misnamed
description:
Looks like commit [14632] broke our the names of our public tarballs on rhel3, and maybe others.

The problem appears to be that commit [14632] assumes a redhat release number like "5.3", and breaks if the release number does not have a period in it, such as: Red Hat Enterprise Linux AS release 3 (Taroon Update 9)

The result is screwed up public tarball names; observe: 

tonic.cs.wisc.edu{tannenba}46: tar xvzf results.tar.gz
public/
public/v7.3/
public/v7.3/condor-7.3.2--.tar.gz
public/v7.3/condor-7.3.2---dynamic.tar.gz
remarks:
2009-May-06 14:36:47 by tannenba:
Hopefully patch below fixes it.

2009-May-06 17:59:53 by tannenba:
Confirmed. At least the problem disappeared in the continuous builds after the below patch was pushed. Ticket resolved.
